original_text: These were born unto the giant in Gath; and they fell by the hand of David, and by the hand of his servants.
korean_text: 가드의 키 큰 자의 소생이라도 다윗의 손과 그 신하의 손에 다 죽었더라

sentences.original_text: These were born unto the giant in Gath
and they fell by the hand of David
and by the hand of his servants
